column1: #Text=The polycrystalline sample of PHTO was synthesized by a solid state reaction under high pressure of 6 GPa and high temperature of 1273 K.

#Text=The starting materials HgO (Aldrich, 99.0% pure), PbO (Alfa, 99.995% pure) and TiO2 (Alfa, 99.995% pure) were mixed homogenously in a molar ratio 1:3:4 and pressed into a pellet with diameter of 6 mm in an argon gas protected glove box with oxygen and H2O level of less than 1 ppm.
#Text=The pre-pressed pellet was sealed in a gold capsule.
#Text=High pressure experiments were performed with the cubic anvil type high pressure apparatus51,52.
#Text=After the pressure was gradually increased to 6 GPa, the sample was heated to 1273 K and maintained for 30 min.
#Text=Then the temperature was quenched to ambient before the release of pressure.
#Text=In this process, yellow polycrystalline PHTO was obtained.
